multiple-choice.question: What is the potential outcome of learning more about how our microbes interact with each other and with our bodies?

options.label: A
options.text: We will understand how to eliminate microbes from our bodies

options.label: B
options.text: We will reveal how to nurture our microbial ecosystems and improve our health

options.label: C

options.label: D
